name: Snake in a hurry!
description:
After running away from the hunter, he finally got you in a such small area!

Here in the jungle, you are doing what is most important for you...

...feeding yourself.

Now here you are, in the last 20 seconds of your life...

...your last meal.

Eat at least 5 eggs and become a hero for the reptiles. (Reptilians included)

RUN THE GAME:

  1. Download the game and unzip the file.
  2. Run the 'snake_in_a_hurry.exe' file.
  3. If you get a windows security warning (see screenshots), do the following:
    1. Click More info
    2. Click Run anyway

*The security warning shows because the game is not digitally signed.

HOW TO PLAY:

Move the snake around without hit the borders of the screen or hit with yourself. You cannot go backwards.

Eat as many eggs as possible until you get smashed by the hunter.

CONTROLS:

Move with the ARROW KEYS. 

Also, you can use these keys:

A = LEFT, D=RIGHT, W=UP, S=DOWN

This game has sound.

NOTE: These is my very first game made ever. I used Pygame to make it.
Thanks for playing.
